description.zh-cn: 香港著名演员、专栏作家、传媒人、前湾仔区议会议员及电台节目主持人。她是中华民国将领白崇禧的堂妹，作家白先勇的堂侄。
description.en: A famous Hong Kong actress, columnist, media personality, former Wan Chai District Councillor, and radio host. She is the cousin of Republic of China general Bai Chongxi and the aunt of writer Pai Hsien-yung.

description.zh-cn: 香港律师及政治人物，白韵琹的丈夫。1989年起与白韵琹同居，1997年结婚。
description.en: A Hong Kong lawyer and politician, and the husband of Pamela Peck Wan-kam. He has been living with Peck since 1989 and they married in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 白韵琹的首任丈夫。
description.en: Pamela Peck Wan-kam's first husband.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军一级上将、中华民国国防部部长。
description.en: A first-class general of the National Revolutionary Army and Minister of National Defense of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家，白崇禧之子。
description.en: A Taiwanese writer, son of Bai Chongxi.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加利福尼亚州旧金山的一所公立大学。
description.en: A public university in San Francisco, California, USA.

description.zh-cn: 香港十八个区议会之一，负责处理湾仔区的地区事务。
description.en: One of the 18 district councils in Hong Kong, responsible for handling district affairs in Wan Chai.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，社民连成员，曾任湾仔区议会议员。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician, member of the League of Social Democrats, and former Wan Chai District Councillor.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名作家、词曲家、主持人。
description.en: A famous Hong Kong writer, lyricist, composer, and host.

description.zh-cn: 香港资深传媒工作者、剧作家。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong media professional and playwright.

description.zh-cn: 香港女作家，黄沾前女友。
description.en: A Hong Kong female writer and former girlfriend of James Wong (Huang Zhan).

description.zh-cn: 香港艺人新马师曾（邓永祥）去世后，其家人之间爆发的遗产纠纷。
description.en: The inheritance dispute that erupted among the family members of Hong Kong artist Sun Ma Sze Tsang (Tang Wing-cheung) after his death.

description.zh-cn: 香港艺人新马师曾的第四任妻子。
description.en: The fourth wife of Hong Kong artist Sun Ma Sze Tsang.

description.zh-cn: 香港粤剧演员，有“慈善伶王”之称。
description.en: A Hong Kong Cantonese opera actor, known as the 'King of Charity Opera'.

description.zh-cn: 香港主持人、演员。
description.en: A Hong Kong host and actor.

description.zh-cn: 新马师曾与洪金梅的女儿。
description.en: The daughter of Sun Ma Sze Tsang and Hung Kam-mui.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一家商业广播电台。
description.en: A commercial radio station in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物。
description.en: A Hong Kong political figure.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，民建联成员。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician and member of the DAB.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的特别行政区，白韵琹的出生地及主要活动地。
description.en: A special administrative region of the People's Republic of China, the birthplace and main area of activity for Pamela Peck Wan-kam.

en: Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 香港的行政机关。
description.en: The executive authorities of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 白韵琹于1970年与安德鲁·邝结婚，同年离婚。
description.en: Pamela Peck married Andrew Kwong in 1970 and they divorced in the same year.

description.zh-cn: 白韵琹自1989年起与谢伟俊同居，并于1997年结婚。她曾公开表示两人关系为有名无实，并曾遭对方殴打。
description.en: Pamela Peck began living with Paul Tse in 1989 and they married in 1997. She has publicly stated that their relationship was in name only and that he had physically assaulted her.

description.zh-cn: 白韵琹是白崇禧的堂妹。
description.en: Pamela Peck is Bai Chongxi's paternal cousin.

description.zh-cn: 白韵琹是白先勇的堂姑。
description.en: Pamela Peck is Pai Hsien-yung's paternal aunt.

description.zh-cn: 在2011年香港区议会选举中，白韵琹击败时任区议员麦国风，使其未能连任。
description.en: In the 2011 Hong Kong District Council election, Pamela Peck defeated incumbent District Councillor Mak Kwok-fung, preventing his re-election.

description.zh-cn: 白韵琹曾与萧若元交往，两人于1983年分手。
description.en: Pamela Peck was in a relationship with Stephen Shiu; they broke up in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 在白韵琹与萧若元于1983年分手后，黄沾在报章上为白韵琹抱不平而辱骂萧若元。
description.en: After Pamela Peck and Stephen Shiu broke up in 1983, James Wong defended Peck by scolding Shiu in the newspapers.

description.zh-cn: 因黄沾在其与白韵琹分手后于报章上辱骂他，萧若元买凶殴打黄沾。
description.en: Because James Wong scolded him in the newspapers after his breakup with Pamela Peck, Stephen Shiu hired thugs to assault Wong.

description.zh-cn: 邓家争产事件爆发后，白韵琹因公开发表支持洪金梅的言论而卷入骂战与诽谤官司。
description.en: After the Tang family property dispute broke out, Pamela Peck became embroiled in public quarrels and a defamation lawsuit for her public statements supporting Hung Kam-mui.

description.zh-cn: 在1997年邓家争产事件中，白韵琹在电台节目中出言支持洪金梅。
description.en: During the Tang family property dispute in 1997, Pamela Peck voiced support for Hung Kam-mui on her radio program.

description.zh-cn: 在1997年邓家争产事件中，白韵琹公开指责新马师曾“浪得虚名”，并批评其子女不孝。
description.en: During the Tang family property dispute in 1997, Pamela Peck publicly accused Sun Ma Sze Tsang of having an undeserved reputation and criticized his children for being unfilial.

description.zh-cn: 因在邓家争产事件上的立场不同，白韵琹与主持人雷宇扬在电台节目中展开骂战。
description.en: Due to differing stances on the Tang family property dispute, Pamela Peck engaged in a public quarrel with host Simon Lui on a radio program.

description.zh-cn: 因白韵琹在邓家争产事件中的言论，邓小艾控告其诽谤。
description.en: Tang Siu-ai sued Pamela Peck for defamation over her remarks during the Tang family property dispute.

description.zh-cn: 因邓家争产事件引发的骂战，白韵琹与谢伟俊被新城电台停职。
description.en: Due to the public quarrels arising from the Tang family property dispute, Pamela Peck and Paul Tse were suspended by Metro Radio.

description.zh-cn: 2004年黄沾离世后，白韵琹与林燕妮爆发骂战。
description.en: After James Wong's death in 2004, Pamela Peck had a public quarrel with Eunice Lam.

description.zh-cn: 黄毓民入禀法院控告白韵琹诽谤。
description.en: Wong Yuk-man filed a lawsuit against Pamela Peck for defamation.

description.zh-cn: 在2010年香港立法会补选中，白韵琹参选以狙击同区候选人黄毓民。
description.en: In the 2010 Hong Kong legislative by-election, Pamela Peck ran to challenge fellow candidate Wong Yuk-man.

description.zh-cn: 在2012年香港立法会选举中，白韵琹参选分薄了同属建制派的刘江华的选票，导致其落选。
description.en: In the 2012 Hong Kong Legislative Council election, Pamela Peck's candidacy split the vote of the pro-establishment camp, leading to the defeat of Lau Kong-wah.

description.zh-cn: 2001年，白韵琹因四项签署虚假利得税报税表的控罪罪名成立，被判入狱3个月及罚款20万元。
description.en: In 2001, Pamela Peck was convicted on four counts of signing false profits tax returns and was sentenced to 3 months in prison and a fine of HK$200,000.
